video.title: Mushi-Shi
video.synopsis: This award-winning anime series brings the viewer into a dreamlike world where ghostly organisms called Mushi hover on the borders of perception.

episodes.synopsis: At a late night ceremony, Ginko meets a brewer who is trying to follow in his father's footsteps by creating unforgettable sake.
episodes.title: Banquet at the Forest's Edge

episodes.synopsis: In a small seaside village where a father seems overprotective of his daughter, Ginko finds a mushi that's an omen of disaster.
episodes.title: The Warbling Sea Shell

episodes.synopsis: In a village where it snows all the time, Ginko meets a boy who can no longer feel cold and is overly sensitive to warmth, putting him in danger.
episodes.title: Beneath the Snow

episodes.synopsis: Ginko must help a hunter who is in danger of losing his mind to a mysterious power that allows him to attract animals using only his hands.
episodes.title: The Hand that Caresses the Night

episodes.synopsis: Ginko tries to help a young woman who is being followed by a mysterious watery creature that drains her energy.
episodes.title: Mirror Lake

episodes.synopsis: Ginko discovers a dark secret about an elderly couple, the woman of which is incredibly beautiful, but lacks all five senses.
episodes.title: Floral Delusion

episodes.synopsis: Ginko meets a woman who travels around farming villages undergoing droughts. She uses her mushi's ability to make rain.
episodes.title: Cloudless Rain

episodes.synopsis: Aboard a merchant sailing vessel, Ginko encounters a crew member who can use mushi to control the wind.
episodes.title: Wind Raiser

episodes.synopsis: Ginko falls ill in a village in the snowy mountains that, despite its frosty location, grows crops thanks to one man's endless stamina.
episodes.title: Valley of the Welling Tides

episodes.synopsis: To escape a mountain caught in an eternal winter, Ginko must learn why the mountain lord trapped some snow mushi.
episodes.title: Depths of Winter

episodes.synopsis: A young, troubled Ginko is taken in by an older Mushi master as he tries to figure out why he seems to bring misfortune wherever he goes.
episodes.title: Cushion of Grass

episodes.synopsis: On his way home at night, a man stumbles across a tunnel that leads him into an unsettling loop of memories. Can Ginko help him break free?
episodes.title: Fragrant Darkness

episodes.synopsis: A young girl vanishes at dusk; the same night, a new girl with no memory shows up in her village. Ginko tries to unravel the mystery decades later.
episodes.title: Lingering Crimson

episodes.synopsis: Whenever she's in pain, a girl with a heart condition visits her former caretaker in an out-of-body experience. But Ginko warns she's in danger.
episodes.title: Hidden Cove

episodes.synopsis: A young boy upset over his mother's illness discovers he can see things no one else sees. Ginko reveals the source of his unusual abilities.
episodes.title: Thread of Light

episodes.synopsis: A girl lives alone in a house, cared for by invisible forces, as her family searches for her in a parallel world. Ginko tries to coax her back home.
episodes.title: Sea of Otherworldly Stars

episodes.synopsis: Ginko meets a boy who is an unusually good swimmer and realizes there's more to his love of water than meets the eye.
episodes.title: Azure Waters

episodes.synopsis: Ginko must help a boy whose body attracts lightning before the strikes prove fatal.
episodes.title: Lightning's End

episodes.synopsis: When a man breaks a taboo by walking through fresh burial grounds, the whole village develops a strange infection -- and Ginko uncovers a dark secret.
episodes.title: Mud Grass

episodes.synopsis: After eating a red fruit, a man begins having memories of a distant past, as if the tree that once watched over his town were trying to speak to him.
episodes.title: Tree of Eternity
